AccessorFunc.name: AccessorFunc
AccessorFunc.desc: Adds simple Get/Set accessor functions on the specified table.

Add_NPC_Class.name: Add_NPC_Class
Add_NPC_Class.desc: Defines a global entity class variable with an automatic value in order to prevent collisions with other {{Enum|CLASS}}. You should prefix your variable with CLASS_ for consistency.

AddBackgroundImage.name: AddBackgroundImage
AddBackgroundImage.desc: Adds the specified image path to the main menu background pool. Image can be png or jpeg.

AddConsoleCommand.name: AddConsoleCommand
AddConsoleCommand.desc: {{Internal}}Tells the engine to register a console command. If the command was ran, the engine calls {{LibraryFunction|concommand|Run}}. If you want to add a console command use {{LibraryFunction|concommand|Add}}.

AddCSLuaFile.name: AddCSLuaFile
AddCSLuaFile.desc: Marks a Lua file to be sent to clients when they join the server.

AddonMaterial.name: AddonMaterial
AddonMaterial.desc: Loads the specified image from the /cache folder, used in combination {{LibraryFunction|steamworks|Download}}.

AddOriginToPVS.name: AddOriginToPVS
AddOriginToPVS.desc: Adds the specified vector to the PVS which is currently building. This allows all objects in visleafs visible from that vector to be drawn.

AddWorldTip.name: AddWorldTip
AddWorldTip.snippet: AddWorldTip(${1:number entindex},${2:string text},${3:number dieTime=0.05},${4:Vector pos},${5:Entity ent})
AddWorldTip.desc: This function creates a World Tip, similar to the one shown when aiming at a Thruster where it shows you its force.

AngleRand.name: AngleRand
AngleRand.desc: Returns an angle with a randomized pitch, yaw and roll, first one between -90 and 90, the rest between -180 and 180 degrees.

assert.name: assert
assert.desc: If the result of the first argument is false or nil, an error is thrown with the second argument as the message.

BroadcastLua.name: BroadcastLua
BroadcastLua.desc: Sends the specified Lua code to all connected clients and executes it.

BuildNetworkedVarsTable.name: BuildNetworkedVarsTable
BuildNetworkedVarsTable.desc: Dumps the networked variables of all entities into one table and returns it.

CancelLoading.name: CancelLoading
CancelLoading.desc: Aborts joining of the server you are currently joining.

ChangeBackground.name: ChangeBackground
ChangeBackground.desc: Sets the active main menu background image to a random entry from the background images pool. Images are added with {{GlobalFunction|AddBackgroundImage}}.

ChangeTooltip.name: ChangeTooltip
ChangeTooltip.desc: Automatically called by the engine when a panel is hovered over with the mouse

ClearBackgroundImages.name: ClearBackgroundImages
ClearBackgroundImages.desc: Empties the pool of main menu background images.

ClientsideModel.name: ClientsideModel
ClientsideModel.desc: Creates a non physical entity that only exists on the client.

ClientsideScene.name: ClientsideScene
ClientsideScene.desc: Creates a scene entity based on the scene name and the entity.

CloseDermaMenus.name: CloseDermaMenus
CloseDermaMenus.desc: Closes all Derma menus that have been passed to {{GlobalFunction|RegisterDermaMenuForClose}} and calls {{HookFunction|GM|CloseDermaMenus}}

collectgarbage.name: collectgarbage
collectgarbage.desc: Executes the specified action on the garbage collector.

ColorAlpha.name: ColorAlpha
ColorAlpha.desc: Returns a new {{Struct|Color}} with the RGB components of the given {{Struct|Color}} and the alpha value specified.

ColorRand.name: ColorRand
ColorRand.desc: Creates a {{Struct|Color}} with randomized red, green, and blue components. If the alpha argument is true, alpha will also be randomized.

ColorToHSV.name: ColorToHSV
ColorToHSV.desc: Converts a {{Struct|Color}} into HSV color space.

CompileFile.name: CompileFile
CompileFile.desc: Attempts to compile the given file. If successful, returns a function that can be called to perform the actual execution of the script.

CompileString.name: CompileString
CompileString.desc: This function will compile the code argument as lua code and return a function that will execute that code.

ConsoleAutoComplete.name: ConsoleAutoComplete
ConsoleAutoComplete.desc: Returns a table of console command names beginning with the given text.

ConVarExists.name: ConVarExists
ConVarExists.desc: Returns whenever a convar with the given name exists

CreateConVar.name: CreateConVar
CreateConVar.desc: Creates a console variable (ConVar), in general these are for things like gamemode/server settings.

CreateMaterial.name: CreateMaterial
CreateMaterial.desc: Creates a new material with the specified name and shader.

CreateParticleSystem.name: CreateParticleSystem
CreateParticleSystem.snippet: CreateParticleSystem(${1:Entity ent},${2:string effect},${3:number partAttachment},${4:number entAttachment=0},${5:Vector offset=Vector( 0, 0, 0 )})

CreateSound.name: CreateSound
CreateSound.desc: Returns a sound parented to the specified entity.

CreateSprite.name: CreateSprite
CreateSprite.desc: Creates and returns a new DSprite element with the supplied material.

CurTime.name: CurTime
CurTime.desc: Returns the uptime of the server in seconds (to at least 4 decimal places)

DebugInfo.name: DebugInfo
DebugInfo.desc: Writes text to the right hand side of the screen, like the old error system. Messages disappear after a couple of seconds.

DeriveGamemode.name: DeriveGamemode
DeriveGamemode.desc: Retrieves data from a gamemode to use in yours. This also sets a BaseClass field on your GM table to the gamemode you are deriving from. It appears that this function works by running the init and cl_init Lua files of the target gamemode, then overriding functions that appear in both the target and your gamemode with your gamemode's functions.

Derma_DrawBackgroundBlur.name: Derma_DrawBackgroundBlur
Derma_DrawBackgroundBlur.desc: Draws background blur around the given panel.

Derma_Hook.name: Derma_Hook
Derma_Hook.desc: Creates panel method that calls the supplied Derma skin hook via {{LibraryFunction|derma|SkinHook}}

Derma_Install_Convar_Functions.name: Derma_Install_Convar_Functions
Derma_Install_Convar_Functions.desc: Makes the panel (usually an input of sorts) respond to changes in console variables by adding next functions to the panel:

Derma_Message.name: Derma_Message
Derma_Message.desc: Creates a derma window to display information

Derma_Query.name: Derma_Query
Derma_Query.snippet: Derma_Query(${1:string text="Message Text (Second Parameter)"},${2:string title="Message Title (First Parameter)"},${3:string btn1text},${4:function btn1func},${5:string btn2text},${6:function btn2func},${7:string btn3text},${8:function btn3func},${9:string btn4text},${10:function btn4func})
Derma_Query.desc: Shows a message box in the middle of the screen, with up to 4 buttons they can press.

Derma_StringRequest.name: Derma_StringRequest
Derma_StringRequest.snippet: Derma_StringRequest(${1:string title},${2:string subtitle},${3:string default},${4:function confirm},${5:function cancel=nil},${6:string confirmText="OK"},${7:string cancelText="Cancel"})
Derma_StringRequest.desc: Creates a derma window asking players to input a string.

DermaMenu.name: DermaMenu
DermaMenu.desc: Creates a DMenu similar to a contextmenu and closes any current menus

DisableClipping.name: DisableClipping
DisableClipping.desc: Sets whether rendering should be limited to being inside a panel or not

DOF_Kill.name: DOF_Kill
DOF_Kill.desc: Cancels current DOF post-process effect started with {{GlobalFunction|DOF_Start}}

DOF_Start.name: DOF_Start
DOF_Start.desc: Cancels any existing DOF post-process effects.

DOFModeHack.name: DOFModeHack
DOFModeHack.desc: A hacky method used to fix some bugs regarding DoF.

DrawBackground.name: DrawBackground
DrawBackground.desc: Draws the currently active main menu background image and handles transitioning between background images. This is called by default in the menu panel's Paint hook.

DrawBloom.name: DrawBloom
DrawBloom.snippet: DrawBloom(${1:number Darken},${2:number Multiply},${3:number SizeX},${4:number SizeY},${5:number Passes},${6:number ColorMultiply},${7:number Red},${8:number Green},${9:number Blue})
DrawBloom.desc: Draws the bloom shader, which creates a glowing effect from bright objects.

DrawColorModify.name: DrawColorModify
DrawColorModify.desc: Draws the Color Modify shader, which can be used to adjust colors on screen.

DrawMaterialOverlay.name: DrawMaterialOverlay
DrawMaterialOverlay.desc: Draws a material overlay on the screen.

DrawMotionBlur.name: DrawMotionBlur
DrawMotionBlur.desc: Creates a motion blur effect by drawing your screen multiple times.

DrawSharpen.name: DrawSharpen
DrawSharpen.desc: Draws the sharpen shader, which creates more contrast.

DrawSobel.name: DrawSobel
DrawSobel.desc: Draws the sobel shader, which detects edges and draws a black border.

DrawSunbeams.name: DrawSunbeams
DrawSunbeams.snippet: DrawSunbeams(${1:number darken},${2:number multiplier},${3:number sunSize},${4:number sunX},${5:number sunY})
DrawSunbeams.desc: Renders the post-processing effect of beams of light originating from the map's sun. Utilises the "pp/sunbeams" material

DrawTexturize.name: DrawTexturize
DrawTexturize.desc: Draws the texturize shader, which replaces each pixel on your screen with a different part of the texture depending on its brightness. See [[Shaders/g_texturize|g_texturize]] for information on making the texture.

DrawToyTown.name: DrawToyTown
DrawToyTown.desc: Draws the toy town shader, which blurs the top and bottom of your screen. This can make very large objects look like toys, hence the name.

DropEntityIfHeld.name: DropEntityIfHeld
DropEntityIfHeld.desc: Drops the specified entity if it is being held by any player with Gravity Gun or +use pickup.

DynamicLight.name: DynamicLight
DynamicLight.desc: Creates or replaces a dynamic light with the given id.

EffectData.name: EffectData
EffectData.desc: Creates a new CEffectData}} object to be used with {{LibraryFunction|util|Effect.

Either.name: Either
Either.desc: An 'if then else'. This is equivalent to (''condition'' and ''truevar'' or ''falsevar'') in Lua.

EmitSentence.name: EmitSentence
EmitSentence.snippet: EmitSentence(${1:string soundName},${2:Vector position},${3:number entity},${4:number channel=CHAN_AUTO},${5:number volume=1},${6:number soundLevel=75},${7:number soundFlags=0},${8:number pitch=100})

EmitSound.name: EmitSound
EmitSound.snippet: EmitSound(${1:string soundName},${2:Vector position},${3:number entity},${4:number channel=CHAN_AUTO},${5:number volume=1},${6:number soundLevel=75},${7:number soundFlags=0},${8:number pitch=100})
EmitSound.desc: Emits the specified sound at the specified position.

EndTooltip.name: EndTooltip
EndTooltip.desc: Removes the currently active tool tip from the screen.

Entity.name: Entity
Entity.desc: Returns the entity with the matching {{ClassFunction|Entity|EntIndex}}.

Error.name: Error
Error.desc: Throws a Lua error with the specified message and stack level.

error.name: error
error.desc: Throws a Lua error and breaks out of the current call stack.

ErrorNoHalt.name: ErrorNoHalt
ErrorNoHalt.desc: Throws a Lua error but does not break out of the current call stack.

EyeAngles.name: EyeAngles
EyeAngles.desc: Returns the angles of the players view calculated by {{HookFunction|GM|CalcView}}.

EyePos.name: EyePos
EyePos.desc: Returns the position of the players view point calculated by {{HookFunction|GM|CalcView}}.

EyeVector.name: EyeVector
EyeVector.desc: Returns the normal of the players view calculated by {{HookFunction|GM|CalcView}} similar to {{GlobalFunction|EyeAngles}}.

FindMetaTable.name: FindMetaTable
FindMetaTable.desc: Returns the meta table for the class with the matching name.

FindTooltip.name: FindTooltip
FindTooltip.desc: Returns the tool-tip text and tool-tip-panel (if any) of the given panel as well as itself

Format.name: Format
Format.desc: Formats the specified values into the string given. Same as {{LibraryFunction|string|format}}.

FrameNumber.name: FrameNumber
FrameNumber.desc: Returns the number of frames rendered since the game was launched.

FrameTime.name: FrameTime
FrameTime.desc: Returns the time in seconds it took to render the last frame.

GameDetails.name: GameDetails
GameDetails.snippet: GameDetails(${1:string servername},${2:string serverurl},${3:string mapname},${4:number maxplayers},${5:string steamid},${6:string gamemode})
GameDetails.desc: Callback function for when the client has joined a server. This function shows the server's loading URL by default.

gcinfo.name: gcinfo
gcinfo.desc: {{Deprecated|This function was deprecated in Lua 5.1 and is removed in Lua 5.2. Use {{GlobalFunction|collectgarbage}}( "count" ) instead.}} Returns the current floored dynamic memory usage of Lua in kilobytes.

GetConVar.name: GetConVar
GetConVar.desc: Gets the ConVar with the specified name.

GetConVarNumber.name: GetConVarNumber
GetConVarNumber.desc: {{Deprecated|Store the ConVar}} object retrieved with {{GlobalFunction|GetConVar}} and call {{ClassFunction|ConVar|GetInt}} or {{ClassFunction|ConVar|GetFloat}} on it.Gets the numeric value ConVar with the specified name.

GetConVarString.name: GetConVarString
GetConVarString.desc: {{Deprecated|Store the ConVar}} object retrieved with {{GlobalFunction|GetConVar}} and call {{ClassFunction|ConVar|GetString}} on it.Gets the string value ConVar with the specified name.

GetDefaultLoadingHTML.name: GetDefaultLoadingHTML
GetDefaultLoadingHTML.desc: Returns the default loading screen URL (asset://garrysmod/html/loading.html)

GetDemoFileDetails.name: GetDemoFileDetails
GetDemoFileDetails.desc: Retrieves data about the demo with the specified filename. Similar to {{GlobalFunction|GetSaveFileDetails}}.

getfenv.name: getfenv
getfenv.desc: Returns the environment table of either the stack level or the function specified.

GetGlobalAngle.name: GetGlobalAngle
GetGlobalAngle.desc: Returns an angle that is shared between the server and all clients.

GetGlobalBool.name: GetGlobalBool
GetGlobalBool.desc: Returns a boolean that is shared between the server and all clients.

GetGlobalEntity.name: GetGlobalEntity
GetGlobalEntity.desc: Returns an entity that is shared between the server and all clients.

GetGlobalFloat.name: GetGlobalFloat
GetGlobalFloat.desc: Returns a float that is shared between the server and all clients.

GetGlobalInt.name: GetGlobalInt
GetGlobalInt.desc: Returns an integer that is shared between the server and all clients.

GetGlobalString.name: GetGlobalString
GetGlobalString.desc: Returns a string that is shared between the server and all clients.

GetGlobalVector.name: GetGlobalVector
GetGlobalVector.desc: Returns a vector that is shared between the server and all clients.

GetHostName.name: GetHostName
GetHostName.desc: Returns the name of the current server.

GetHUDPanel.name: GetHUDPanel
GetHUDPanel.desc: Returns the panel that is used as a wrapper for the HUD.

GetLoadPanel.name: GetLoadPanel
GetLoadPanel.desc: Returns the loading screen panel and creates it if it doesn't exist.

GetLoadStatus.name: GetLoadStatus
GetLoadStatus.desc: Returns the current status of the server join progress.

GetOverlayPanel.name: GetOverlayPanel
GetOverlayPanel.desc: Returns the menu overlay panel, a container for panels like the error panel created in {{HookFunction|GM|OnLuaError}}.

GetRenderTarget.name: GetRenderTarget
GetRenderTarget.desc: Creates or gets the rendertarget with the given name.

GetRenderTargetEx.name: GetRenderTargetEx
GetRenderTargetEx.snippet: GetRenderTargetEx(${1:string name},${2:number width},${3:number height},${4:number sizeMode},${5:number depthMode},${6:number textureFlags},${7:number rtFlags},${8:number imageFormat})
GetRenderTargetEx.desc: Creates or gets the rendertarget with the given name, this function allows to adjust the creation of a rendertarget more than {{GlobalFunction|GetRenderTarget}}

GetSaveFileDetails.name: GetSaveFileDetails
GetSaveFileDetails.desc: Retrieves data about the save with the specified filename. Similar to {{GlobalFunction|GetDemoFileDetails}}.

GetViewEntity.name: GetViewEntity
GetViewEntity.desc: Returns the entity the client is using to see from (such as the player itself, the camera, or another entity).

HSVToColor.name: HSVToColor
HSVToColor.desc: Converts a color from HSV color space into RGB color space and returns a {{Struct|Color}}.

HTTP.name: HTTP
HTTP.desc: Launches a threaded http request with the given parameters

include.name: include
include.desc: Executes a Lua script either relative to the current file, or absolute(relative to the /lua/ folder).

IncludeCS.name: IncludeCS
IncludeCS.desc: {{Deprecated|To send the target file to the client simply call AddCSLuaFile() in the target file itself.}}

ipairs.name: ipairs
ipairs.desc: Returns an iterator function for a for loop, to return ordered key-value pairs from a table.

isangle.name: isangle
isangle.desc: Returns if the passed object is an Angle.

isbool.name: isbool
isbool.desc: Returns if the passed object is a boolean.

IsColor.name: IsColor
IsColor.desc: Returns whether the given object is or isn't a color.

IsEnemyEntityName.name: IsEnemyEntityName
IsEnemyEntityName.desc: Returns if the given NPC class name is an enemy.

IsEntity.name: IsEntity
IsEntity.desc: Returns if the passed object is an Entity}}. Alias of {{GlobalFunction|isentity.

isentity.name: isentity
isentity.desc: Returns if the passed object is an Entity.

IsFirstTimePredicted.name: IsFirstTimePredicted
IsFirstTimePredicted.desc: Returns if this is the first time this hook was predicted.

IsFriendEntityName.name: IsFriendEntityName
IsFriendEntityName.desc: Returns if the given NPC class name is a friend.

isfunction.name: isfunction
isfunction.desc: Returns if the passed object is a function.

IsInGame.name: IsInGame
IsInGame.desc: Returns true if the client is currently playing either a singleplayer or multiplayer game.

ismatrix.name: ismatrix
ismatrix.desc: Returns whether the passed object is a VMatrix.

IsMounted.name: IsMounted
IsMounted.desc: Checks whether or not a game is currently mounted. Uses data given by {{LibraryFunction|engine|GetGames}}. Currently does not work correctly serverside on dedicated servers.

isnumber.name: isnumber
isnumber.desc: Returns if the passed object is a number.

ispanel.name: ispanel
ispanel.desc: Returns if the passed object is a Panel.

isstring.name: isstring
isstring.desc: Returns if the passed object is a string.

istable.name: istable
istable.desc: Returns if the passed object is a table.

IsTableOfEntitiesValid.name: IsTableOfEntitiesValid
IsTableOfEntitiesValid.desc: Returns whether or not every element within a table is a valid entity

IsUselessModel.name: IsUselessModel
IsUselessModel.desc: Returns whether or not a model is useless by checking that the file path is that of a proper model.

IsValid.name: IsValid
IsValid.desc:
Checks if a table or class is valid
Checks that an object is not nil, has an IsValid method and if this method returns true.

isvector.name: isvector
isvector.desc: Returns if the passed object is a Vector.

JoinServer.name: JoinServer
JoinServer.desc: Joins the server with the specified IP.

JS_Language.name: JS_Language
JS_Language.desc: Adds javascript function 'language.Update' to an HTML panel as a method to call Lua's {{LibraryFunction|language|GetPhrase}} function.

JS_Utility.name: JS_Utility
JS_Utility.desc: Adds javascript function 'util.MotionSensorAvailable' to an HTML panel as a method to call Lua's {{LibraryFunction|motionsensor|IsAvailable}} function.

Label.name: Label
Label.desc: Convenience function that creates a DLabel, sets the text, and returns it

LanguageChanged.name: LanguageChanged
LanguageChanged.desc: Callback function for when the client's language changes. Called by the engine.

Lerp.name: Lerp
Lerp.desc: Performs a linear interpolation from the start number to the end number.

LerpAngle.name: LerpAngle
LerpAngle.desc: Returns point between first and second angle using given fraction and linear interpolation

LerpVector.name: LerpVector
LerpVector.desc: Linear interpolation between two vectors. It is commonly used to smooth movement between two vectors.

LoadPresets.name: LoadPresets
LoadPresets.desc: Loads all preset settings for the {{Lib|presets}} module and returns them in a table

Localize.name: Localize
Localize.desc: Returns a localisation for the given token, if none is found it will return the default(second) parameter.

LocalPlayer.name: LocalPlayer
LocalPlayer.desc: Returns the player object of the current client.

LocalToWorld.name: LocalToWorld
LocalToWorld.desc: Translates the specified position and angle from the specified coordinate system into worldspace coordinates

Material.name: Material
Material.desc: Either returns the material with the given name, or loads the material interpreting the first argument as the path.

module.name: module
module.desc: Creates a table with the specified module name and sets the function environment for said table.

Msg.name: Msg
Msg.desc: Writes every given argument to the console.

MsgAll.name: MsgAll
MsgAll.desc: Works exactly like {{GlobalFunction|Msg}} except that, if called on the server, will print to all players consoles plus the server console.

MsgC.name: MsgC
MsgC.desc: Just like {{GlobalFunction|Msg}}, except it can also print colored text, just like {{LibraryFunction|chat|AddText}}.

MsgN.name: MsgN
MsgN.desc: Just like {{GlobalFunction|Msg}}, except it adds a newline (''"\n"'') at the end.

NamedColor.name: NamedColor
NamedColor.desc: Returns named color defined in resource/ClientScheme.res.

next.name: next
next.desc: Returns the next key and value pair in a table

NumDownloadables.name: NumDownloadables
NumDownloadables.desc: Returns the number of files needed from the server you are currently joining.

NumModelSkins.name: NumModelSkins
NumModelSkins.desc: Returns the amount of skins the specified model has

OnModelLoaded.name: OnModelLoaded
OnModelLoaded.snippet: OnModelLoaded(${1:string modelName},${2:number numPostParams},${3:number numSeq},${4:number numAttachments},${5:number numBoneControllers},${6:number numSkins},${7:number size})
OnModelLoaded.desc: {{Internal}} Called by the engine when a model has been loaded. Caches model information with the {{Lib|sql}} library.

OpenFolder.name: OpenFolder
OpenFolder.desc: Opens a folder with the given name in the garrysmod folder using the operating system's file browser. Currently broken on OS X and Linux.

OrderVectors.name: OrderVectors
OrderVectors.desc: Modifies the given vectors so that all of vector2's axis are larger than vector1's by switching them around. Also known as ordering vectors

pairs.name: pairs
pairs.desc: Returns an iterator function({{GlobalFunction|next}}) for a for loop that will return the values of the specified table in an arbitrary order.

ParticleEffectAttach.name: ParticleEffectAttach
ParticleEffectAttach.desc: Creates a particle effect with specialized parameters.

Path.name: Path
Path.desc: Creates a path for the bot to follow

pcall.name: pcall
pcall.desc: Calls a function and catches an error that can be thrown while the execution of the call.

Player.name: Player
Player.desc: Returns the player with the matching {{ClassFunction|Player|UserID}}.

PositionSpawnIcon.name: PositionSpawnIcon
PositionSpawnIcon.desc: Moves the given model to the given position and returns view information based on its properties

PrecacheParticleSystem.name: PrecacheParticleSystem
PrecacheParticleSystem.desc: Precaches the particle with the specified name.

PrecacheSentenceFile.name: PrecacheSentenceFile
PrecacheSentenceFile.desc: Load and precache a custom sentence file.

PrecacheSentenceGroup.name: PrecacheSentenceGroup
PrecacheSentenceGroup.desc: Precache a sentence group in a sentences.txt definition file.

print.name: print
print.desc: Writes every given argument to the console.

PrintMessage.name: PrintMessage
PrintMessage.desc: Displays a message in the chat, console, or center of screen of every player.

PrintTable.name: PrintTable
PrintTable.desc: Recursively prints the contents of a table to the console.

ProtectedCall.name: ProtectedCall
ProtectedCall.desc: Runs a function without stopping whole script on error.

RandomPairs.name: RandomPairs
RandomPairs.desc: Returns an iterator function that can be used to loop through a table in random order

rawequal.name: rawequal
rawequal.desc: Compares the first and the second argument without calling their __eq operator.

rawget.name: rawget
rawget.desc: Gets the value with the specified key from the table without calling the __index method.

rawset.name: rawset
rawset.desc: Sets the value with the specified key from the table without calling the __newindex method.

RealFrameTime.name: RealFrameTime
RealFrameTime.desc: Returns the real frame-time which is unaffected by host_timescale. To be used for GUI effects (for example)

RealTime.name: RealTime
RealTime.desc: Returns the uptime of the game/server in seconds (to at least 4 decimal places)

RecipientFilter.name: RecipientFilter
RecipientFilter.desc: Creates a new recipient filter object.

RecordDemoFrame.name: RecordDemoFrame
RecordDemoFrame.desc: Adds a frame to the currently recording demo.

RegisterDermaMenuForClose.name: RegisterDermaMenuForClose
RegisterDermaMenuForClose.desc: Registers a Derma element to be closed the next time {{GlobalFunction|CloseDermaMenus}} is called

RememberCursorPosition.name: RememberCursorPosition
RememberCursorPosition.desc: Saves position of your cursor on screen. You can restore it by using {{GlobalFunction|RestoreCursorPosition}}.

RemoveTooltip.name: RemoveTooltip
RemoveTooltip.desc: Does the removing of the tooltip panel. Called by {{GlobalFunction|EndTooltip}}.

RenderAngles.name: RenderAngles
RenderAngles.desc: Returns the angle that the clients view is being rendered at

RenderDoF.name: RenderDoF
RenderDoF.snippet: RenderDoF(${1:Vector origin},${2:Angle angle},${3:Vector usableFocusPoint},${4:number angleSize},${5:number radialSteps},${6:number passes},${7:boolean spin},${8:table inView},${9:number fov})
RenderDoF.desc: Renders a Depth of Field effect

RenderSuperDoF.name: RenderSuperDoF
RenderSuperDoF.desc: Renders the Super Depth of Field post-process effect

require.name: require
require.desc: First tries to load a binary module with the given name, if unsuccessful, it tries to load a Lua module with the given name.

RestoreCursorPosition.name: RestoreCursorPosition
RestoreCursorPosition.desc: Restores position of your cursor on screen. You can save it by using {{GlobalFunction|RememberCursorPosition}}.

RunConsoleCommand.name: RunConsoleCommand
RunConsoleCommand.desc: Executes the given console command with the parameters.

RunGameUICommand.name: RunGameUICommand
RunGameUICommand.desc: Runs a menu command. Equivalent to {{GlobalFunction|RunConsoleCommand}}( "gamemenucommand", command ) unless the command starts with the "engine" keyword in which case it is equivalent to {{GlobalFunction|RawConsoleCommand}}( command ).

RunString.name: RunString
RunString.desc: Evaluates and executes the given code, will throw an error on failure.

RunStringEx.name: RunStringEx
RunStringEx.desc: Same functionality as and {{GlobalFunction|RunString}} with the added ability to choose the error identifier (as opposed to the default "RunString").

SafeRemoveEntity.name: SafeRemoveEntity
SafeRemoveEntity.desc: Removes the given entity unless it is a player or the world entity

SavePresets.name: SavePresets
SavePresets.desc: Overwrites all presets with the supplied table. Used by the {{Lib|presets}} module for preset saving

ScreenScale.name: ScreenScale
ScreenScale.desc: Returns a number based on the Size argument and your screen's width. The screen's width is always equal to size 640. This function is primarily used for scaling font sizes.

ScrH.name: ScrH
ScrH.desc: Returns the height of GMod's window (in pixels).

ScrW.name: ScrW
ScrW.desc: Gets the width of GMod window (in pixels).

select.name: select
select.desc: Used to select single values from a vararg or get the count of values in it.

ServerLog.name: ServerLog
ServerLog.desc: Prints "ServerLog: PARAM" without a newline, to the server log and console.

SetClipboardText.name: SetClipboardText
SetClipboardText.desc: Adds the given string to the computers clipboard, which can then be pasted in or outside of GMod with Ctrl + V.

setfenv.name: setfenv
setfenv.desc: Sets the enviroment for a function or a stack level, if a function is passed, the return value will be the function, otherwise nil.

SetGlobalAngle.name: SetGlobalAngle
SetGlobalAngle.desc: Defines an angle to be automatically networked to clients

SetGlobalBool.name: SetGlobalBool
SetGlobalBool.desc: Defined a boolean to be automatically networked to clients

SetGlobalEntity.name: SetGlobalEntity
SetGlobalEntity.desc: Defines an entity to be automatically networked to clients

SetGlobalFloat.name: SetGlobalFloat
SetGlobalFloat.desc: Defines a floating point number to be automatically networked to clients

SetGlobalInt.name: SetGlobalInt
SetGlobalInt.desc: Sets an integer that is shared between the server and all clients.

SetGlobalString.name: SetGlobalString
SetGlobalString.desc: Defines a string to be automatically networked to clients

SetGlobalVector.name: SetGlobalVector
SetGlobalVector.desc: Defines a vector to be automatically networked to clients

setmetatable.name: setmetatable
setmetatable.desc: Sets, changes or removes a table's metatable. Returns Tab (the first argument).

SetPhysConstraintSystem.name: SetPhysConstraintSystem
SetPhysConstraintSystem.desc: Called by the engine to set which constraint system [https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Phys_constraintsystem] the next created constraints should use

SortedPairs.name: SortedPairs
SortedPairs.desc: This function can be used in a for loop instead of {{GlobalFunction|pairs}}. It sorts all '''keys''' alphabetically.

SortedPairsByMemberValue.name: SortedPairsByMemberValue
SortedPairsByMemberValue.desc: Returns an iterator function that can be used to loop through a table in order of member values.

SortedPairsByValue.name: SortedPairsByValue
SortedPairsByValue.desc: Returns an iterator function that can be used to loop through a table in order of its '''values'''.

SoundDuration.name: SoundDuration
SoundDuration.desc: Returns the duration of the sound specified in seconds.

SQLStr.name: SQLStr
SQLStr.desc: Returns the input value in an escaped form so that it can safely be used inside of queries. The returned value is surrounded by quotes unless noQuotes is true. Alias of {{LibraryFunction|sql|SQLStr}}

STNDRD.name: STNDRD
STNDRD.desc: Returns the ordinal suffix of a given number.

SuppressHostEvents.name: SuppressHostEvents
SuppressHostEvents.desc: Suppress any networking from the server to the specified player.

SysTime.name: SysTime
SysTime.desc: Returns a highly accurate time since the start up, ideal for benchmarking.

TextEntryLoseFocus.name: TextEntryLoseFocus
TextEntryLoseFocus.desc: Clears focus from any text entries player may have focused.

TimedCos.name: TimedCos
TimedCos.desc: Returns a cosine value that fluctuates based on the current time

TimedSin.name: TimedSin
TimedSin.desc: Returns a sine value that fluctuates based on the current time. The value returned will be between the start value plus/minus the range value.

tobool.name: tobool
tobool.desc: Attempts to return an appropriate boolean for the given value

ToggleFavourite.name: ToggleFavourite
ToggleFavourite.desc: Toggles whether or not the named map is favorited in the new game list.

tonumber.name: tonumber
tonumber.desc: Converts the string to a number with the given base, returns nil on failure.

tostring.name: tostring
tostring.desc: Attempts to convert an object to a string, if defined, it will call the __tostring method for the given object's metatable, {{GlobalFunction|print}} also uses this functionality.

type.name: type
type.desc: Returns a string representing the name of the type of the passed object.

TypeID.name: TypeID
TypeID.desc: Gets the associated type ID of the variable.

unpack.name: unpack
unpack.desc: This function takes a numeric indexed table and return all the members as a vararg. If specified, it will start at the given index and end at end index.

UnPredictedCurTime.name: UnPredictedCurTime
UnPredictedCurTime.desc: Returns the current asynchronous in-game time.

UpdateLoadPanel.name: UpdateLoadPanel
UpdateLoadPanel.desc: Runs JavaScript on the loading screen panel ({{GlobalFunction|GetLoadPanel}}).

UpdateRenderTarget.name: UpdateRenderTarget
UpdateRenderTarget.desc: Renders the rt material with the current angles and position of the given entity.

VectorRand.name: VectorRand
VectorRand.desc: Returns a random vector whose components are each between -1 and 1

VGUIFrameTime.name: VGUIFrameTime
VGUIFrameTime.desc: Returns the time in seconds it took to render the VGUI.

VGUIRect.name: VGUIRect
VGUIRect.desc: Returns a DShape Derma element with the given dimensions

VisualizeLayout.name: VisualizeLayout
VisualizeLayout.desc: Briefly displays layout details of the given panel on-screen

WorldToLocal.name: WorldToLocal
WorldToLocal.desc: Translates the specified position and angle into the specified coordinate system.
